title: somthing is wrong
body: i played like 25/20 ranked games of solo i had the solo emblem the whole time you can check my match history and i played 1 game with a full team and now i have a dynamic preference please help me with this anyone from riot you can check my match history and the profile history{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} oh and also on a side note i know its majority of WINS and still all of my wins and loses are solo but the problem isnt that i dont have solo its that i played with a full team and have dynamic? and it was only for 1 game

replies.body: Looking into this for you, it looks like a majority of your games have been with a premade earlier on resulting in a dynamic preference, and have recently been playing a lot more solo games.  As you continue to win more solo matches, your emblem will automatically be changed to the solo emblem.  We also have a [Ranked Emblem](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209346066-Ranked-Emblems) guide that may provide additional information on this.  I hope that helps!
